title: RP Sale??
body: Just wondering if there is going to be an RP sale soon, snowdown skins are out and i plan to buy 100dollars worth of RP but i don't want to get RP if there is going to be a sale!

replies.body: Riot points are never on sale. Sometimes they announce bonus points for a purchase but they do that MONTHS before it actually happens. Only store items actually get a discount.
check the accouncements section, or read the patch from yesterday dude, rito ALWAYS announces big rp sales so that people know it's coming and wont beg for refunds if they buy rp beforehand
